sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="project-card" outlined :elevation="elevation" @click="onClick">
    <v-card-title class="project-name">{{ "projectName" }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text class="student-count">{{ 55 }} Students</v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    projectName: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    studentCount: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    elevation: {
      type: [Number, String],
      default: 1
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onClick () {
      // Emit a click event when the card is clicked
      this.$emit('click')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.project-card {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px; /* Adjust max-width as needed */
  margin: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: ; /* Adjust background color */
  color: #333; /* Adjust text color */
}

.project-name {
  font-size: 18px; /* Adjust font size */
  font-weight: bold; /* Adjust font weight */
}

.student-count {
  font-size: 14px; /* Adjust font size */
  color: #888; /* Adjust text color */
}
</style>
